name: Knight Guy
description:
Knight Guy: The Curse of the Seriously Evil, Evil Doers

*this game is still in development and may contain bugs.*

Default Controls:

WASD to move.

Space to Jump.

Return/Enter to Attack.

Backslash to use Shield. (requires power)
